nodes.text: This Mudgub princess was royalty among the Mudgub tribe of the Forest Moon of Endor. In 3 ABY, she was considered as a potential bride for Vork, the prince of a tribe of Gorphs. Despite Vork's interest in the princess, his mother, Queen Slugga, did not approve. On her orders, the Gorph guards cast the Mudgub princess into "the pit."
This princess was created by writer Paul Dini for the Nelvana Ewoks animated television series. The episode "Princess Latara," which first aired on September 20, 1986, is her only appearance.
